me.name: Jerald Dagaang
me.desc: CHEDx2.O Event Website: A platform developed to support the CHEDx2.O IT Education Summit, a national initiative connecting schools, industry, and government to advance IT education and foster collaboration.

projects.name: Chedx Website
projects.desc: The CHEDx2.O Event Website was developed to support CHEDx, a national IT education summit series organized by the Commission on Higher Education (CHED). These events aim to bridge the gap between academia and the IT industry by promoting collaboration and aligning education with industry needs. The website served as the central platform for attendees to access key event information, including the event program, detailed schedule, speaker lineup, and online registration.

projects.name: Prison Coin
projects.desc: PrisonCoin is a permissioned blockchain-based digital currency system tailored for use within correctional facilities. It enables a secure, accountable, and transparent financial environment for inmates, reducing risks associated with contraband trade and manual accounting.

projects.name: Multimodal Banana Panama Disease Detection System
projects.desc: This project aims to build a scalable, modular system for detecting Panama disease in banana plants using a combination of IoT sensors, edge computing, and image-based disease classification. It includes a web application, a mobile app, and integrated backend services.

projects.name: Prince School Supplies Inventory System
projects.desc: Designed and developed a custom inventory management system to replace the company’s outdated, manual processes. The system streamlined operations by automating invoice tracking, managing supplier inventory levels, and providing the admin with actionable business analytics—all integrated into a centralized database.

projects.name: Closeout Connection
projects.desc: Developed and maintained Closeout Connection, a New York-based eCommerce store specializing in luxury homeware. Built using Shopify Liquid to deliver a high-quality, elegant shopping experience with curated products at exclusive closeout prices.

projects.name: PopStop E-Commerce Website
projects.desc: Built and maintained PopStop, a New Zealand-based Shopify eCommerce store for pop culture collectibles. Used Shopify Liquid to create a dynamic shopping experience featuring Pop Vinyl figures, action figures, board games, comics, and more.

projects.name: PeelHealth
projects.desc: Developed PeelHealth, a Flutter mobile app using YOLO for detecting banana diseases, handling both frontend and backend development, and collaborating with the client through weekly feedback sessions to ensure seamless functionality and user experience.

experience.desc: The CHEDx2.O Event Website is a platform created to support the CHEDx2.O IT Education Summit, a national event that brings together schools, industries, and the government to improve IT education.

Led a team of 5 developers to build a custom inventory management system, automating invoice tracking, supplier management, and data centralization, while delivering analytics tools to support data-driven decision-making and improve operational efficiency.

Developed Shopify e-commerce websites for PopStop (New Zealand), a pop culture collectibles store, and Closeout Connection (New York, USA), a luxury homeware retailer. Delivered responsive, SEO-optimized storefronts featuring intuitive navigation, and custom product functionality to enhance user experience and drive conversions.
